posts.author: icehole3
posts.title:
Left wing extremists are demanding that charges be brought against LAPD officers for using tear gas on a crowd which included a baby.

Child Protective Services is looking into why a family brought a baby to a riot.

Whoever brought this baby should be arrested.

twitter.content:
This was meant to provoke outrage & escalation. Holy shit, LAPD is walking around looking for BABIES to mace!! 😳

Instead, the reactions were more sensible: Who the fuck brings a baby to a RIOT???

The OP has since deleted this.

Still - we'll see more of this type of thing.
